pages.text: $(li)Ocelots are passive animals that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/bamboo_jungle)Bamboo Jungles$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Ocelots will sprint away from you.$(br)$(li)To tamed it  except you have to hold a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_cod)Raw Cod$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_salmon)Raw Salmon$(/l), wait until the Ocelot approach you and give it the fish.

$(li)Repeat this process a couple of times until it stops running away from you.$(br)$(li)Tamed Ocelots will not follow you unless you are holding a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_cod)Raw Cod$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_salmon)Raw Salmon$(/l) in your hand.$(br)$(li)You can carry them with a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/lead)Lead$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/creeper)Creepers$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/phantom)Phantoms$(/l) will run away from Ocelots.
